participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and resilient, she often reflects on her past struggles and strives to keep moving forward.
participant_1.background: my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Excited and optimistic, he is looking forward to the future and enjoys sharing his experiences with others.
participant_2.background: i am expecting triplets in three months. i just moved into my first home. i work at a school. i already have step children.

content.text: hi, i work as a school teacher, and you?
